section.p: To renounce the worship of Lacuna, you must pay 40 Shards in compensation to the shrine.
‘If you forsake the love of the goddess, you will never survive the rigours of the wilderness,’ warns the priestess.

if.if:
If you still want to renounce the worship of Lacuna,
cross off the 40 Shards and delete Lacuna
from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
